definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a given name or surname, originating from Scottish and English roots, often associated with historical figures such as General Charles George Gordon.
definitions.explanation_cn: 专有名词，通常用作姓氏或名字，源自苏格兰和英格兰，常与历史人物如查尔斯·乔治·戈登将军相关联。
definitions.example_en: General Gordon became a national hero for his defense of Khartoum.
definitions.example_cn: 戈登将军因保卫喀土穆而成为民族英雄。
